thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Former Equifax Executive Charged With Insider Trading

author: Dave Michaels
title: Former Equifax Executive Charged With Insider Trading
text:
A former technology executive at Equifax Inc. was charged with insider trading on Wednesday over claims that he sold shares in the company before it announced its massive data breach last year. ​
The Securities and Exchange Commission and federal prosecutors in Georgia charged Jun Ying with insider trading, according to an announcement from the SEC. Mr. Ying who was indicted by a federal grand jury on Tuesday, reaped over $1 million from exercising Equifax options after concluding “that Equifax had suffered a serious breach,”...
